text: @realDonaldTrump More repetition @realDonaldTrump? Are you getting that forgetful or are you trying desperately to deflect from your abysmal handling of the #CoronavirusPandemic AND #BountyGate ??? @RVAT2020 @43Biden #TraitorTrump
